name: ITLibMediaEntity
desc: This class describes a media entity, which can be a media item, such as an audio track.

items.name: var persistentID: NSNumber
items.desc: The unique identifier of the media entity.

items.name: func enumerateValues(forProperties: Set<String>?, using: (String, Any, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
items.desc: Executes a provided block with the fetched values for the item properties.

items.name: func enumerateValuesExcept(forProperties: Set<String>?, using: (String, Any, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
items.desc: Executes a provided block with the fetched values for all properties in the entity except for the provided set.

items.name: func value(forProperty: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Gets the value for a specified media property key.
